CustomField.description: Maximum number of hours a resource can enter for a timecard week. If exceeded, an error message is displayed. Enter a percentage value and symbol, eg. 90%, to specify a maximum percentage of work calendar hours.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Maximum number of hours a resource can enter for a timecard week. If exceeded, an error message is displayed. Enter a percentage value and symbol, eg. 90%, to specify a maximum percentage of work calendar hours.
CustomField.label: Maximum Resource Hours Per Week
